name: Bullish Engulfing
description: A bullish engulfing pattern occurs after a downtrend, where the body of a larger green candle completely engulfs the body of the preceding smaller red candle.

name: Bearish Engulfing
description: A bearish engulfing pattern occurs during an uptrend, where the body of a larger red candle completely engulfs the body of the preceding smaller green candle.

name: Doji
description: A Doji pattern shows indecision in the market, with the opening and closing prices almost the same, resulting in a small body and long shadows.

name: Morning Star
description: A Morning Star is a bullish reversal pattern appearing after a downtrend. It consists of three candles: a large bearish candle, a small indecisive candle (often a Doji), and a large bullish candle.

name: Evening Star
description: An Evening Star is a bearish reversal pattern found after an uptrend. It consists of three candles: a large bullish candle, a small indecisive candle (often a Doji), and a large bearish candle.

name: Hammer
description: A Hammer pattern is a bullish reversal pattern after a downtrend, with a long lower wick and a small body at the top, showing strong rejection of lower prices.

name: Shooting Star
description: A Shooting Star is a bearish reversal pattern occurring at the top of an uptrend. It has a long upper wick and a small body at the bottom, indicating a rejection of higher prices.

name: Spinning Top
description: A Spinning Top pattern reflects market indecision, characterized by a small body in the middle with long upper and lower shadows.

name: Inverted Hammer
description: An Inverted Hammer is a bullish reversal pattern found at the bottom of a downtrend. It has a long upper wick and a small body at the bottom, indicating rejection of lower prices.

name: 3 Soldiers
description: The Three White Soldiers is a bullish reversal pattern consisting of three consecutive green candles, each closing progressively higher.

name: 3 Crows
description: The Three Black Crows is a bearish reversal pattern consisting of three consecutive red candles, each closing progressively lower.

name: Dragonfly Doji
description: A Dragonfly Doji is a reversal pattern that occurs when the opening and closing prices are the same, with a long lower shadow and no upper shadow.

name: Gravestone Doji
description: A Gravestone Doji is a reversal pattern that occurs when the opening and closing prices are the same, with a long upper shadow and no lower shadow.

name: Hammer Pattern
description: A Hammer is a bullish reversal pattern with a long lower wick and a small body at the top, indicating a rejection of lower prices.

name: Inverted Hammer Pattern
description: An Inverted Hammer is a bullish reversal pattern found at the bottom of a downtrend. It has a long upper wick and a small body at the bottom, suggesting a rejection of lower prices.

name: Inverted Hammer
description: An Inverted Hammer is a bullish reversal pattern found at the bottom of a downtrend. It has a long upper wick and a small body at the bottom, suggesting a rejection of lower prices.
